text:
Hi Team,
if anyone tell mw how to add trailing slash to hs_path in hubdb for dynamic pages ?
Hi all! I would like to ask if it is possible to not to have navbar the same in the landing page but have it on the subpages, using the same template. Thank you!

Hey Everyone,

I am wondering if anyone has had any luck embedding an entire trello board using Iframe? I am using the insert option within the rich text module, and when I try to embed the trello board, the area is just white. 

The site is not yet published.
